StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [ReOpenTrainingEval]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@EvalID uniqueidentifier, @UpdateUserId uniqueidentifier
AS BEGIN
UPDATE [RSSOSS].[USMC].[TrainingEvalua.on] SET SignatureID = null, LastUpdatedDate = GETDATE(), LastUpdatedBy = @UpdateUserId, CompletedDate = null WHERE ID = @EvalID
END
